creator: Kudo Coach Fitness Training
descriptionHtml:
Kudo Coach builds you a flexible, personalised cycling training plan, that adapts to your busy life. Use Kudo Coach to train for any cycling event from your first Gran Fondo or Sportive, to this year's big road race or mountain bike cross country event.

Most training plans are way too prescriptive, inflexible, and leave you feeling un-motivated. Kudo Coach is different - it gives you simple to follow weekly goals that adapt to your busy life.

The pros might have 8 hours a day to train - but you probably don’t. Kudo Coach looks at how much time you spend on the bike each week, and builds an easy to follow training plan.

Kudo Coach adapts your training plan to make the best use of your precious time.

How it works

Kudo Coach monitors your heart rate or power for each training session and calculates a Training Load. The Training Load is a combination of the session's duration and intensity, which gives us a better idea of the training stress your body has experienced.

A weekly training plan is then built based on your recent weekly Training Load. The training plan is broken down using Periodisation which is a tried and tested training technique used to break down your plan into periods. Each period is designed to prepare you for the next training period , and ultimately your event.

You can also upgrade to Kudo Coach Premium which gives you access to extra features to turbo charge your training. Kudo Coach Premium includes a Smart Workout Planner along with Tailored Training Advice and Tips relevant to you and where you are in your plan. Start your 14 day Kudo Coach Premium free trial today. After your free trial has ended, you can continue using Kudo Coach for Free without the Premium features, or you can upgrade to Kudo Coach Premium by setting up a subscription payment.
descriptionShort: Simple, flexible cycling training plan that adapts to your busy life

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Lots of improvements under the hood enabling some exciting new features in the pipeline!

title: Kudo Coach: Cycling Training Plan

creator: Kudo Coach Fitness Training
descriptionHtml:
• Builds you a personalised cycling training plan that adapts to your busy life
• Power and heart rate based indoor and outdoor workouts
• Training advice and guidance backed with elite coaching experience

TAILORED TRAINING PLAN
• Your training plan is built around your training goals or upcoming cycling events - anything from your first club ride, Gran Fondo, Sportive or 100 miler, to this year's race calendar.

• Log rides using Kudo Coach, or other platforms like Garmin, Wahoo, Polar or Strava; all your ride data is collected, analysed and used to update your training plan.

• Most cycling training plans are way too prescriptive, inflexible, and leave you feeling unmotivated. Kudo Coach is different - it gives you simple to follow daily and weekly goals that adapt to your busy life.

• The pros might have 8 hours a day to train - but you don’t. Kudo Coach optimises your limited training time for maximum performance gains.

WORKOUTS
• Suggests the most effective workout from a library of over 1,000 proven, structured indoor and outdoor workouts, based on where you are in your training plan, your recent ride data, and details of your upcoming events.

• Connects to your Bluetooth heart rate monitor, power meter, speed/cadence device and smart trainer.

• Periodically recommends a fitness test workout to track progress towards your training goals.

TRAINING ADVICE AND GUIDANCE
• Personalised and timely training advice and tips from Oli Beckingsale, 3 times Olympic cyclist and in-house pro-cycling coach.

• Helps you understand the sports science behind your training plan, making you a faster more effective cyclist, better able to reach your training goals.

GREAT VALUE
Kudo Coach will have a bigger impact on your performance than all your other cycling purchases combined, and for a fraction of the cost, or your money back. Give it a spin with a 30 day free trial. Cancel anytime.
descriptionShort: Get faster by training smarter - your complete cycling training solution

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Some small bug fixes and performance improvements

title: Kudo Coach: Cycling Training Plan

creator: Kudo Coach Fitness Training
descriptionHtml:
Kudo Coach builds you a flexible, personalised cycling training plan, that adapts to your busy life. Use Kudo Coach to train for any cycling event from your first Gran Fondo, Sportive or 100 miler, to this year's big road race or mountain bike XC event.

Most training plans are way too prescriptive, inflexible, and leave you feeling un-motivated. Kudo Coach is different - it gives you simple to follow weekly goals that adapt to your busy life.

The pros might have 8 hours a day to train - but you probably don’t. Kudo Coach looks at how much time you spend on the bike each week, and builds an easy to follow training plan.

Kudo Coach adapts your training plan to make the best use of your precious time.

How it works

Ride indoors or outside with Kudo Coach on your handlebars. Kudo Coach connects to your Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) heart rate monitors, power meters, speed/cadence devices and smart trainers.

Either log your rides with Kudo Coach, or by linking to another training service, and your efforts will be analysed and used to adapt your training plan.

Kudo Coach monitors your heart rate or power for each training session and calculates a Training Load. The Training Load is a combination of the session's duration and intensity, which gives us a better idea of the training stress your body has experienced.

A weekly training plan is then built based on your recent weekly Training Load. The training plan is broken down using Periodisation which is a tried and tested training technique used to break down your plan into periods. Each period is designed to prepare you for the next training period , and ultimately your event.

Try Kudo Coach for free for 14 days after which you can continue by setting up a monthly, 6 monthly or yearly subscription.
descriptionShort: Simple, flexible cycling training plan that adapts to your busy life

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Fixed a bug where certain Bluetooth training devices could not be reconnected after losing connection

title: Kudo Coach: Cycling Training Plan

creator: Kudo Coach Cycling Training
descriptionHtml:
• Builds you a personalised cycling training plan that adapts to your busy life
• Track your rides indoors and outside
• Power and heart rate based indoor and outdoor workouts
• Training advice and guidance backed with elite coaching experience

TAILORED TRAINING PLAN
• Your training plan is built around your training goals or upcoming cycling events - anything from your first club ride, Gran Fondo, Sportive or 100 miler, to this year's race calendar.

• Track rides using Kudo Coach, or other platforms like Garmin, Wahoo, Polar or Strava; all your ride data is collected, analysed and used to update your training plan.

• Most cycling training plans are way too prescriptive, inflexible, and leave you feeling unmotivated. Kudo Coach is different - it helps you stay on track with simple to follow daily and weekly goals that adapt to your busy life.

• The pros might have 8 hours a day to train - but you don’t. Kudo Coach optimises your limited training time for maximum performance gains.

CYCLING TRACKER
• Track your rides with the Kudo Coach app on your bars as your bike computer or head unit, or from your pocket

• Track all your data in realtime as you ride, from speed, distance and elevation using GPS tracking, to heart rate, power, cadence and training load from your connected Bluetooth training devices

• Compatible with Bluetooth smart trainers and turbo trainers for tracking your rides indoors

WORKOUTS
• Suggests the most effective workout from a library of over 1,000 proven, structured indoor and outdoor workouts, based on where you are in your training plan, your recent ride data, and details of your upcoming events and training goals.

• Connects to your Bluetooth heart rate monitor, power meter, speed/cadence device and smart trainer.

• Controls your smart trainer in ERG mode

• Periodically recommends a fitness test workout to track progress towards your training goals.

TRAINING ADVICE AND GUIDANCE
• Personalised and timely training advice and tips from Oli Beckingsale, 3 times Olympic cyclist and in-house pro-cycling coach.

• Helps you understand the sports science behind your training plan, making you a faster more effective cyclist, better able to reach your training goals.

GREAT VALUE
Kudo Coach will have a bigger impact on your performance than all your other cycling purchases combined, and for a fraction of the cost, or your money back. Give it a spin with a 14 day free trial. Cancel anytime.
